name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Mark Daniel GREELEY, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Mark Daniel GREELEY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of April, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and “Appellant’s Motion to Amend His Petition for an Allowance of Appeal” are denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 857
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Mark Daniel GREELEY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 11, 2012.
